channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox decomposing and causing smell, 24th September
item.description:
Potentially been there a while as smells certainly strongly and is covered in maggots. Danger to health. Is tucked in a bush just by junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wood panels fly tipped on Southwold Road, 24th September
item.description:
I caught someone fly tipping. When I asked him what he was doing, he pretended not to hear me and avoided me. I didn’t insist as I was with my family and didn’t feel safe. I managed to catch his matriculation plate: CX14 YUW. Silver Ford Focus.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Corner of Well Road, Christchurch Hill, 24th September
item.description:
